refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the number of columns for the most recent query

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the number of columns for the most recent query on the connection represented by the link parameter. This function can be useful when using the maxdb_store_result function to determine if the query should have produced a non-empty result set or not without knowing the nature of the query.

refsect1.title: Return values
refsect1.para: An integer representing the number of fields in a result set

example.title: Procedural style
example.programlisting:
<?php
$link = maxdb_connect("localhost", "MONA", "RED");

maxdb_report (MAXDB_REPORT_OFF);
maxdb_query($link,"DROP TABLE friends");
maxdb_report (MAXDB_REPORT_ERROR);

maxdb_query($link, "CREATE TABLE friends (id int, name varchar(20))"); 
 
maxdb_query($link, "INSERT INTO friends VALUES (1,'Hartmut')");
maxdb_query($link, "INSERT INTO friends VALUES (2, 'Ulf')");

if (maxdb_field_count($link)) {
   /* this was a select/show or describe query */
   $result = maxdb_store_result($link);
   
   /* process resultset */
   $row = maxdb_fetch_row($result);

   /* free resultset */
   maxdb_free_result($result);
}

/* close connection */
maxdb_close($link);
?>
